product_name: Eagle Creek No Matter What Flashpoint Duffel - Small
long_description: Built for the rigors of the road, the Eagle Creek No Matter What Flashpoint small duffel makes an ideal travel companion on short jaunts. Extra-durable, water-resistant Bi-Tech(TM) fabric, bartacked reinforcements at all stress points and lockable, self-repairing, stormflap-protected main zipper. Separate, reusable stuff pouch stores the No Matter What Flashpoint duffel and doubles as an internal packing pocket for shoes and gear that you want to keep separate. Top external compression straps secure and stabilize bag contents. Removable padded shoulder strap and nonslip carry handle provide a comfortable carry; end and center haul-handles ease handling. Front exterior zippered pocket stores quick-access items. Back slip panel allows stacking on wheeled luggage.
short_description: Built for the rigors of the road, the Eagle Creek No Matter What Flashpoint small duffel makes an ideal travel companion on short jaunts.
